Articles.Content:
You might wonder who funds our company. It's the important Kerbal figures in society. Sadly, space tourism is not mainstream so our job is to make it available to public!

Lead Engineer: Victory143

Vice Engineer: Bobnova

Employees put this in their posts.

Edited October 4, 2013 by victory143
What are the rules behind all this? What mod packs are allowed, which ones are not?
This is a STOCK company.Sorry.

This is our craft page!

These craft are made by our engineers.

Spark High Altitude Jet

Edited October 1, 2013 by victory143

Our First creation!

The Spark High Altitude Jet

It can reach 100,000FT by going in to a vertical climb and and keeping the throttle fully powered! A Kerbal can experience an average FIVE minutes of No-G weightlessness!

DOWNLOAD LINK

http://www./view/2eb4wj...de_Plane.craft

Sorry for no pictures, I'll get them soon.

i know you guys mean well, but do we need another zokesia such and such?

dont get me wrong you make some good stuff but 1 thread is enough no?

Could I be vice engineer as I LOVE cozy spaceships and space tourism.

EDIT: Taken back, I won't join.

Edited October 1, 2013 by Kinglet
Taken back
Well something was missing so I filled the gap. Anyone want to join?
is there a limit of how many g we pull?

I read "space tourism" and "kerbal" and I think "dirt cheapest way to get a kerbal in a can into space".

If that's the right approach, sign me up as an engineer! I'll come up with something in a bit here.

where is the sense to be in such a group? you all just sit somewhere at your pcÃ‚Â´s you cant multiplayer test pilots will build rockets too...soo it seems it is the normal game with stranger "friends"

Gotcha a nice logo:

And your employee badge:

@schrimschrim: the point of the group is to build and share craft with other people. this particular group specializes in tourist ships, like shuttles, stations, rovers, landers, all built for the puropse of returning the kerbals at the end of the flight.

Edited October 1, 2013 by zekes
Ok, but all this stuff can do everyone for him self too? and in this group all have to build for his own? cause here is no multiplayer

Ok, but all this stuff can do everyone for him self too? and in this group all have to build for his own? cause here is no multiplayer

no, you all build spereately, and choose what to upload. you can put up whatever you want, really.
My tourist orbiter + spacetrikes operation is coming along. Balancing space trikes turns out to be difficult, as does surviving reentry on a spacetrike. RIP Dilzor Kerman.
Nice bob, you are an Engineer. Wanna be vice engineer?

Ha, sure!

The tourist orbiter is nearing completion. The spacetrikes are balanced, re-entry is survivable if you conserve fuel to slow your speed before the chutes snap fully open. The tourist canister explodes on landing 50% of the time, that needs some work.

Almost the entire rocket comes down on chutes and is reusable to cut long term costs.

THIS ThREAD IS NOW CLOSED- THE TOURISM DIVISON IS CLOSED. DO NOT POSt

GAH I don't have time to run it! it was stillborn...

Edited November 15, 2013 by victory143
...sorry to see it end like this.

Can't say I saw that coming, heh.

Not sure the recently ex-vice engineer is going to obey orders, not when the rocket is about done already
Ok bob send me the craft file. I'll make sure it gets credit. Sorry. D:
